channel.title: non-tech on I Am Josh's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in non-tech on I Am Josh's Blog

item.title: Introduction
item.description: A Dream I’m a software engineer, a casual gamer, and a film enjoyer. This makes for a lot of screentime. At 1700, I would log off my work laptop and deftly change the monitor/mouse/keyboard to my PC. When I know what hobby I want to pursue, I can get straight to it, but in those phases where I “have all these games but don’t know what to play” or I can’t stop scrolling through my Letterboxd watchlist feeling uninspired, the default state is to be browsing.
